actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for civil service retirement purposes, service as an officer or employee of Howard University.

summary.text: Includes as creditable service for civil service retirement purposes employment by Howard University if such employment is financed directly by Federal funds.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for civil service retirement purposes, service as an officer or employee of Howard University.
